mapper.select: SELECT ORG_ID,ORG_NAME,OPERATE_SCORE FROM WBMP_OPERATE_SCORE WHERE OPERATE_DATE=#{now} ORDER BY OPERATE_SCORE DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT ORG_ID,ORG_NAME,OPERATE_SCORE FROM WBMP_OPERATE_SCORE WHERE OPERATE_DATE=#{now} ORDER BY OPERATE_SCORE ASC LIMIT 5
select IFNULL(( SELECT OPERATE_SCORE FROM WBMP_OPERATE_SCORE WHERE ORG_ID=#{orgId} and DATE_FORMAT(OPERATE_DATE,'%Y-%m')=#{mouth} ORDER BY OPERATE_DATE desc LIMIT 1),0)
select IFNULL((SELECT OPERATE_SCORE FROM WBMP_OPERATE_SCORE WHERE ORG_ID=#{orgId} and DATE_FORMAT(OPERATE_DATE,'%Y')=#{year} ORDER BY OPERATE_DATE desc LIMIT 1),0)

SELECT s.ORG_ID AS org_id,s.OPERATE_SCORE AS score,DATE_FORMAT(s.OPERATE_DATE,'%Y-%m') AS date_dt FROM `wbmp_operate_score` s INNER JOIN (SELECT ORG_ID,MAX(OPERATE_DATE)as OPERATE_DATE FROM `wbmp_operate_score` GROUP BY ORG_ID, DATE_FORMAT(OPERATE_DATE,'%Y-%m') ORDER BY OPERATE_DATE DESC LIMIT 10000 ) a on s.ORG_ID = a.ORG_ID and s.OPERATE_DATE = a.OPERATE_DATE where a.ORG_ID = #{orgId} and (s.OPERATE_DATE <= DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH),'%Y-%m') and s.OPERATE_DATE >= DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 13 MONTH),'%Y-%m')) ORDER BY s.OPERATE_DATE desc

SELECT s.ORG_ID AS org_id,s.OPERATE_SCORE AS score, CONCAT(year(s.OPERATE_DATE),'-', quarter(s.OPERATE_DATE)) AS date_dt FROM `wbmp_operate_score` s INNER JOIN (SELECT ORG_ID,MAX(OPERATE_DATE)as OPERATE_DATE FROM `wbmp_operate_score` GROUP BY ORG_ID, CONCAT(year(OPERATE_DATE),'-', quarter(OPERATE_DATE)) ORDER BY OPERATE_DATE DESC LIMIT 10000 ) a on s.ORG_ID = a.ORG_ID and s.OPERATE_DATE = a.OPERATE_DATE where a.ORG_ID = #{orgId} ORDER BY s.OPERATE_DATE LIMIT 5

SELECT s.ORG_ID AS org_id,s.OPERATE_SCORE AS score ,DATE_FORMAT(s.OPERATE_DATE,'%Y') AS date_dt FROM `wbmp_operate_score` s INNER JOIN (SELECT ORG_ID,MAX(OPERATE_DATE)as OPERATE_DATE FROM `wbmp_operate_score` GROUP BY ORG_ID, DATE_FORMAT(OPERATE_DATE,'%Y') ORDER BY OPERATE_DATE DESC LIMIT 10000 ) a on s.ORG_ID = a.ORG_ID and s.OPERATE_DATE = a.OPERATE_DATE and a.ORG_ID = #{orgId} ORDER BY s.OPERATE_DATE desc LIMIT 3
